Key:
(Today, Kaguya and I are on our first official
date. She's pulling my arm as we walk through
town.)

Shido, I wanna see that shop next! Oh,
take a look at those clothes!

H-Hey, wait a minute Kaguya! I'm coming,
so let go of my arm.

Sigh. At this rate, Shido's arm will rip from
its socket.

(Yuzuru is trailing behind, looking a little
winded. I thought about choosing one over the
other, but it's okay for us to be all together.)

Yuzuru, hurry up! Man, why are you guys
walking in the back? Pick up the pace.

Advice. This is no different from our previous
dates. Kaguya, he is your boyfriend, so you
should claim him and flirt with him more.

(I can't tell if I'm in shock or bliss, but it's
nice to savor each day for what it was. To
spend it with someone you love.)

Shido, Yuzuru, we will always be together,
okay?!
